definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be kindled, kindle (NH id., also bore, Aram. [[קְדַח]], qdah. bore, kindle; Ar. qadah.a strike fire (with flint, etc.); Ph. [[מקדח]] is lamp-lighter (in temple) acc. To CIS:I, No.352, i.s);—

definitions.title: Qal 1.
definitions.body: be kindled: Pf. 3 fs.[[אֵשׁ קָֽדְחָה בְּאַפִּי]] De 32:22, Je 15:14, Je 15:14, Je 17:4 (rdg.[[קָֽדְחָה]] for [[קְדַחְתֶּם]]), all of ´[[י]]:’s wrath.
act. kindle; Inf. cstr. [[כִּקְדׂחַ]] [[אֵשׁ הֲמָסִים]] Is 64:1 (v. [[[הֶמֶס]]]); Pt.[[קׂדְחֵי אֵשׁ]] Is 50:11.
